entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Swift Current
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:20 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swift Current Airport 2:26 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.1°C
Pressure: 103.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: SE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
